item.title: My Journey with Morning Duty Companion
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Introduction ğŸŒ„ I am excited to share my journey of creating Morning Duty Companion, a simple but useful tool designed to assist RIB RAs with routine morning duty. ğŸš€ The Inspiration ğŸ’¡ The idea for Morning Duty Companion extends from Night Duty Companion, a successful app I previously developed to streamline night duty management. Recognizing the challenges faced by RAs during morning duty checks, I decided to tackle this aspect and create a solution that simplifies and enhances the process.

item.title: My Journey with Night Duty Companion ğŸŒ™
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Introduction ğŸš€ I am excited to share my journey of creating Night Duty Companion, a simple but powerful tool designed to facilitate Raffles Institution Boarding (RIB) night duties. As a passionate computer science enthusiast and developer, I found this project to be a perfect opportunity to combine my love for programming with my desire to build something genuinely helpful for my life and community. The Inspiration ğŸ’¡ The idea for Night Duty Companion originated from my experiences as a Residential Assistant at Raffles Institution Boarding School.

item.title: The Influence of Coach Greg Doucette: A Humble Realization in My Fitness Journey
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Striking the Balance: Cardiovascular and Strength Training in My Fitness Journey ğŸ’ªğŸš´â€â™‚ï¸ In my pursuit of fitness, I’ve discovered a transformative realization that has become the cornerstone of my journey: the importance of striking the perfect balance between cardiovascular and strength training. A Focused Pursuit As a dedicated fitness enthusiast, I initially immersed myself in rigorous strength training, eager to see visible results. While this approach yielded satisfying outcomes, it inadvertently overshadowed the significance of cardiovascular exercises for overall well-being.

item.title: My Experience as a Teaching Assistant in the School of Computing
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Last week, I completed my journey as a Teaching Assistant (TA) in the School of Computing. This role has been a valuable and rewarding experience, and I want to share my journey as a TA, including how I got the position and the insights I gained from this opportunity. ğŸ“ The Module I Taught I served as a TA for the module CS1101S Programming Methodology. ğŸ–¥ï¸ CS1101S introduces the concepts of programming and computational problem-solving.

item.title: Unexpected Use of Zobrist Hashing :eyes:
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: I’m excited to share a surprising discovery I made while working on a programming assignment for the CS3230 module, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, at NUS. This revelation involves the unexpected application of Zobrist Hashing, a technique primarily designed for board games, to efficiently solve a challenging problem unrelated to gaming. Get ready for a bit of technical insight! Revisiting Zobrist Hashing ğŸ•¹ï¸ In my previous post, I shared my experiences developing an AI agent to play the board game “Breakthrough” for the CS2109S individual project.

item.description: Hey there, fellow fitness enthusiasts! Let’s talk about the major mistakes I’ve made during my muscle-building journey. I’m sharing them here as valuable lessons to avoid repeating. We’re all in this together, and I hope my experiences can help you too! ğŸ’ªğŸš€

item.title: The Power of Iterative Deepening Minimax Search with Alpha-Beta Pruning ğŸ’¥
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: In my pursuit of knowledge in Computer Science, I undertook a mini-project during the course CS2109s (Introduction to AI and ML). The project aimed to build an AI agent for a simple yet intriguing board game called Breakthrough, implementing the iterative deepening minimax search algorithm with alpha-beta pruning. The capabilities of this AI agent left me amazed and eager to share my journey with you! ğŸŒğŸ”

item.description: Today was a special day in my fitness journey â€“ I managed to bench press 90KG for 6 reps! ğŸ’ª I’m excited to share this milestone with you all, and let’s take a moment to celebrate together! ğŸ‰ A Journey of Ups and Downs ğŸ˜Š Over the past one and a half years, life threw some challenges my way â€“ with the pandemic and gym restrictions, it wasn’t easy to maintain my regular training.
